msg.msgText:
A "CertificateProfile" composite object can be created using the "create" option of the "imaserver" command.
SYNTAX: imaserver create CertificateProfile help imaserver create CertificateProfile "Name=value" "Item1=value1" ...
EXAMPLE: imaserver create CertificateProfile "Name=CertProfile" "Certificate=server.cer" "Key=server.key"
Configuration items for "CertificateProfile" object:

msgExplanation.p: This message is the text of a command or an object help.
